mapper.select: select region_no, region_name, region_photoname from region
mapper.insert: insert into category (cate_name, mno, region_no, cate_startdate, cate_enddate, cate_photoname, cate_photopath) values (#{cate_name}, #{mno}, #{region_no}, #{cate_startdate}, #{cate_enddate}, #{cate_photoname}, #{cate_photopath})
